Seen this script at so many places :3[/quote]

item.title: Vote Pop-up
item.dc:creator: @Flintstone Flintstone
item.description:
@Flintstone wrote:

Add this in your body.

[code]

Vote for YourServerName!



Remind me to vote tomorrow

[/code]

Made myself. (:

If you use, please leave a reply.
